
```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
applications_leeds = get_planit_data(
limit = 500,
auth = "Leeds",
app_size = "large",
app_state = "permitted"
)

tm_shape(applications_leeds) + tm_dots(col = "app_type") +
tm_basemap(server = "CartoDB.Positron")
```
